issue.message: Method.invoke requires both an upper and lower SDK bounds checks to be safe, and the upper bound must be below SdkVersionInfo.HIGHEST_KNOWN_API.

A `<queries>` declaration should generally be used instead of QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES; see https://g.co/dev/packagevisibility for details

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "condition", in androidx.test.uiautomator.UiDevice.wait) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
issue.errorLine1: public <U> U wait(@NonNull Condition<? super UiDevice, U> condition, long timeout) {

issue.message: Unknown nullability; explicitly declare as `@Nullable` or `@NonNull` to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://developer.android.com/kotlin/interop#nullability_annotations
